column5: I lost my boaters card.  	how can I get a replacement?

It depends on where you got your card from, it seems there is no full data base of cards.  So if you got it from one of the groups that were issuing card , they may be out of business and you are s o l
Ya it looks like I’ll have to write it again
Where's the rest of your wallet?  Maybe beg forgiveness from the wife and ask for it back and tell her you'll do the laundry and breakfast in bed for the next 4 months.
I would love to do that, but my wife passed away from COVID on May 23rd.  	she was a front line worker at Toronto General hospital.
Sad to hear of your loss.
Very sad news & so sorry to hear that.
So sad to hear and very sorry to hear.
